subject: Baseball
World Series
Coaches and Managers
Halls of Fame
lead_paragraph: Whitey Herzog spent seven seasons with the Mets, as the third-base coach under Manager Wes Westrum in the 1960s and as a scout and director of player development.
snippet: Whitey Herzog spent seven seasons with the Mets, as the third-base coach under Manager Wes Westrum in the 1960s and as a scout and director of player development.
